com.jkjk.GameWorld

Class HudRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jkjk.GameWorld.HudRenderer

  • public class HudRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    HudRenderer contains the rendering of all HUD icons, such as touchpad, item slots and timers.
    Author:
    LeeJunXiang
